root: ^Look what the cat dragged in! It's Hades! That big bad brute that has Queen Vex in such a stir! What are you doing here? Come to fight for your Princess?

c-0: ^Ugh! Same old slash and dash Hades! No class to him, the only thing you have going is your loyalty to that crown of thorns. Hissss!
^All loyalties have their price. Besides, once I kill you I'll be free as a bird!

c-1: ^Fine. Since you seem so merciful, put your mercy to good use and take out Vexxy for me?
^I swear that woman drives me nuts, she's 42 but wishes she was 13... oopsie, prolly should have kept that to myself mwehuehue...
^Well, we can agree on that! How about we chat one on one, 'kay?
^That princess of yours has got me feelin' all soft, she reminds me of beautiful bluebells back home.

c-0: ^WHAT! That's absurd! ... it's just, Vex hasn't been the same since she's been here is all. If anyone is jealous it's Vex.
^I swear that woman drives me nuts, she's 42 but wishes she was 13... oopsie, prolly should have kept that to myself mwehuehue...
c-1: ^Hissss. You are a nasty and vile man Hades. How dare you pit us girls against each other just to fuel your ego! You'll die for that!
^Oh no no, the roses back home are the real delight! Need to be seen in all their glory hun!

c-0: ^Oh wow! Hades I didn't know you were so charming! I'd be honored to show you.
^In fact, go this way! We'll get out of here much quicker! See you on the outside Mr. Charmer! Teehee!
c-1: ^Jeez, tough crowd. And I was going to share the answer to the puzzle with you too... too bad for you!
